short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds data to Pivotal Tracker stories showing what environments they have been deployed to.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds information to Pivotal Tracker stories indicating where they have been deployed based on story IDs and git SHAs in a commits.json file being served on a deployable environment.
